Views

Interface Informable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ToysView

    public interface Informable
    This interface contains set of specific messages for users dialog and provides each class that implements it with ability to output messages to console.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Slava Poliakov

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String EMPTY_INPUT
      String that represents message to user about empty input
      static java.lang.String INPUT_BUDGET
      String that represents starting message to user about budget
      static java.lang.String MAIN_MENU
      String that represents main menu
      static java.lang.String SELECT_MENU
      String that represents selecting menu
      static java.lang.String SELECTED_BY
      String that represents selected-menu part of resulting message to user
      static java.lang.String SORT_MENU
      String that represents sorting menu
      static java.lang.String SORTED_BY
      String that represents sorted-menu part of resulting message to user
      static java.lang.String START_INFO
      String that represents head part of resulting message to user
      static java.lang.String SUM_OF_PRICES
      String that represents message to user about total price
      static java.lang.String TABLE_BORDER
      String that represents border of data's table
      static java.lang.String WRONG_INPUT
      String that represents message to user about wrong input
